caption.title:
The impact of delayed policies on CO 2 concentrations, emission reduction rate and relative GWP Q
d .
caption.p: The set of trajectories of the 2035 scenario is included in the 2025 set which is included in the 2010 set. One random trajectory is also represented for each scenario. Note that the optimal pathway (from the temperature-limited scenario) expects an immediate reduction of CO 2 emissions.
